content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Hello Ryanah Rahman, thank you for coming to see our apartment in Mannheim. We do charge a rental price for the apartment, but we would need to discuss the specifics of your situation to determine a fair price. May I ask what your budget is for the rental?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am looking for the lowest possible price, I am a student and I am dependable and responsible, I want to be on good terms with my landlord.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: I understand. As a landlord, we are looking to maximize our gains, but we also want to find a responsible and dependable tenant. Would you be able to provide us with some information about your background and why you would be a good fit for our apartment? This will help us determine a fair rental price.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Sure, I am studying in Mannheim, I have a part-time job and I plan to stay in Mannheim for at least a year. I am also a student, so I need a quiet and comfortable place to study.

I am also very dependable and responsible, I have a good credit history and I can provide references from previous landlords.

I am looking for a apartment that is in good condition, clean and well-maintained. I am also flexible with the move-in date and the rental price.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for providing that information. Based on what you've told us, we are willing to offer you the apartment for a rental price of 800 Euros per month. This price takes into account the size and location of the apartment, as well as the fact that you are a responsible and dependable tenant. We believe that this is a fair price for both parties, and we are confident that you will be happy with the apartment and our service. Would you agree to this rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine
